title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at South Dakota Tech (Rapid City, SD) in Nov 2011
Interview Descriptions: It was simple interview with my supervisor. He asked about my research interest, why I want to pursue grad. education. My supervisor asked me about any laboratory experience, field sampling, data analysis experience and etc. Especially they wanted someone with knowledge on GC. Overall it was a great interview. I finally got the offer and accept it.
Interview Questions: How can you contribute in our laboratory?

title: Faculty Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at South Dakota Tech (South Bend, IN) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. 6 interviewers,  including faculty, staff and administrator.  Each one asked one question.
Interview Questions: What is the strength and weekness?

title: Assistant Laboritory Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at South Dakota Tech (Rapid City, SD) in Feb 2010
Interview Descriptions: I knew a person that worked at SDSMT and he let me give the laboratory director a resume. The director of the lab gave me an on the spot interview and from there on it was just a matter of paperwork and waiting as the South Dakota School system hiring processes move very slow.
Interview Questions: What types of skills do you have that would be related to this job?
